DataSource.query:
select
distinct *
from
(
select
distinct
vertragsstamm,
olap_ve_schl,
'N',
NULL,
to_date(monatsscheibe,'Mon_YY')
from
dtl_br_vertrag
where
to_date(monatsscheibe,'Mon_YY') between to_date('Jan_'||(select substr(monatsscheibe,5,2) from pv_parameter),'Mon_YY') and (select max(last_day(to_date(monatsscheibe,'Mon_YY'))) from dtl_br_vertrag where last_day(to_date(monatsscheibe,'Mon_YY')) <= (select last_day(to_date('Dez_'||substr(monatsscheibe,5,2),'Mon_YY')) from pv_parameter))

union all
select
distinct
'VS_'||kd_nr||'_MAN',
olap_ve_schl,
'N',
'KDMAN',
to_date(monatsscheibe,'Mon_YY')
from
dtl_br_kunden_man_rest
where
to_date(monatsscheibe,'Mon_YY') between to_date('Jan_'||(select substr(monatsscheibe,5,2) from pv_parameter),'Mon_YY') and (select max(last_day(to_date(monatsscheibe,'Mon_YY'))) from dtl_br_kunden_man_rest where last_day(to_date(monatsscheibe,'Mon_YY')) <= (select last_day(to_date('Dez_'||substr(monatsscheibe,5,2),'Mon_YY')) from pv_parameter))

union all
select
'VS_'||kd_nr||'_MAN',
olap_ve_schl,
'N',
'KDPRV',
to_date(monatsscheibe,'Mon_YY')
from
dtl_br_provisionen_rest
where
to_date(monatsscheibe,'Mon_YY') between to_date('Jan_'||(select substr(monatsscheibe,5,2) from pv_parameter),'Mon_YY') and (select max(last_day(to_date(monatsscheibe,'Mon_YY'))) from dtl_br_provisionen_rest where last_day(to_date(monatsscheibe,'Mon_YY')) <= (select last_day(to_date('Dez_'||substr(monatsscheibe,5,2),'Mon_YY')) from pv_parameter))
and kd_nr is not null

union all
select
case
  when pv_kez <> 'PVS'
  then 'A_'||kostenstelle
  else 'A_VVS_NA' 
end as kostenstelle,
olap_ve_schl,
'N',
'PRV',
to_date(monatsscheibe,'Mon_YY')
from
dtl_br_provisionen_rest
where
to_date(monatsscheibe,'Mon_YY') between to_date('Jan_'||(select substr(monatsscheibe,5,2) from pv_parameter),'Mon_YY') and (select max(last_day(to_date(monatsscheibe,'Mon_YY'))) from dtl_br_vertrag where last_day(to_date(monatsscheibe,'Mon_YY')) <= (select last_day(to_date('Dez_'||substr(monatsscheibe,5,2),'Mon_YY')) from pv_parameter))
and kd_nr is null

union all

select
vertragsstamm,
olap_ve_schl,
'N',
NULL,
stichtag
from
dtl_vr_auszahlungen a
where stichtag between to_date('Jan_'||(select substr(monatsscheibe,5,2) from pv_parameter),'Mon_YY') and  (select max (stichtag) from dtl_vr_auszahlungen where stichtag <= (select to_date('31.12.'||to_char(stichtag,'YYYY'),'DD.MM.YYYY') from vr_parameter))
and (nvl(a.buergschaften,0)+nvl(a.programmkredite,0)+nvl(a.disagio,0)+nvl(a.gebuehren_provisionen,0)+nvl(a.globaldarlehen,0)+
nvl(a.liquiditaetwirksame_auszahlung,0)) <> 0
)
order by 2,5
